package.name: motoman_gp25_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Motoman gp25 (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman gp25 manipulators.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in YASKAWA MOTOMAN-GP25 INSTRUCTIONS (HW1485496) version 185194-1CD, rev 0. All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Eric Marcil
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
